mapper.select: SELECT s.id,w.company_id,w.created,w.enddate,if(enddate>NOW(),'모집중','마감') state, w.id wantedid, c.company_name, s.user_id FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON w.company_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN subscribes s ON s.company_id= w.id WHERE s.user_id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, company_id, created FROM subscribes WHERE id = #{id}
